name: 4w MarketPlace
overview: 4w MarketPlace is a startup company of Digital Magics, the internet startup incubator. Thanks to an exclusive agreement with the Premium Publisher Network in 2009, 4w MarketPlace has become the leading Italian advertising network, handling the high-performance contextual online advertising campaigns for some of Italy’s most important publishing groups: RCS MediaGroup, Gruppo Editoriale L’Espresso, Gruppo Finelco, Class Editori, RAI, La Stampa, ANSA… As well as the main local publishers. In September 2011, 4w MarketPlace is the first and unique Italian network has been received the certification by Facebook as advertising provider enabling to sell advertising on the apps within the social network. In October 2011, 4w MarketPlace has been started its Mobile business, creating a new inventory based on app and Msites. By now 3 are the networks branded by 4w MarketPlace: 4w Net offers to advertisers an exclusive access to qualified audiences and to publishers online revenues optimization on their verticals sites. 4w Mobile can integrate the contextual and visual advertising with the geo-targeting features dedicated to the smartphones communication. 4w Social has the advertising management for the website and app integrated to Facebook.

milestones.description: Subscription of the exclusive agreement with the italian Premium Publisher Network
Certification by Facebook as advertising provider
